#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long  long int ll;
 
int main() {
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    /* Enter your code here. Read input from STDIN. Print output to STDOUT */   
  ll l,flag=0,t,n,q,r,a[100000],ans,j,i,c,d,e,f,g,h;
  //char s[100000];
  //string s;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
        {
    cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
    ll    s=1;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
           {
            s=(s*a[i])%1000000007;
        }
        s=s%1000000007;
        cout<<s<<endl;
    }
    
    return 0;
}
